description:
These are the default scales for the three date/time class. These will
usually be added automatically. To override manually, use
<U+2060>scale_*_date<U+2060> for dates (class Date),
<U+2060>scale_*_datetime<U+2060> for datetimes (class POSIXct), and
<U+2060>scale_*_time<U+2060> for times (class hms).
example_call: scale_x_time(name = waiver(), breaks = waiver(), minor_breaks = waiver(),
